data.name: Call of Duty®: Black Ops II - Extra Slots Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Extra Slots Pack increases the number of customizable Create-A-Class slots to 10 sets of 5 slots and significantly expands media storage capacity, allowing players to archive 20 more emblems, 32 more films and 40 more screenshots.

NOTICE: Activision does not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free online media storage, and shall not provide any refunds in the event that any stored media is lost, or access to the online systems is degraded or interrupted, for any reason including system damage or outage. Activision may at its discretion discontinue the provision of online storage, and/or reduce the number of storage slots, at any time following one year from your purchase of these additional storage slots without notice. By purchasing this item you agree to the above.

fullgame.name: Call of Duty®: Black Ops II

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Japanese, Polish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS:Windows® XP SP3/Windows Vista®/Windows® 7/ Windows® 8
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo E4400 @ 2.00 GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 4000+ @ 2.0 GHz processor or better
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:AMD Radeon HD 4670 512MB or Nvidia Geforce 8800 GT 512MB or better
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:9 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX® 9.0C or later
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
